name: VoxelNoir Project
description:
!!!ALERT!!!

Don`t play the game if you have epilepsy or similar disease

!!!ALERT!!!

In the future, working on the web isn`t as safe as now. 

You don`t make websites here. That`s for AI. Web developers 
now are hackers-mercenaries, using VR to control their 
programs. You`re one of them. Steal data, destroy firewalls, 
kill all your enemies in this classic shooter in Retro Wave style.

Features:
 - 10 unique levels
 - 12 weapons
 - Multi-language support
 - 3D menu
